title: Powders and Positivity to Transform Your Life
description:
How to stay positive when everything seems impossible. Plus, supplement powders for each stage of your work out, and emails on losing weight during menopause, alternative flour pastas, and new additions to Jillian’s My Fitness app.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ


From this episode:

Alaya Naturals: promo code JM20 for 20% off your first order

Send your brief question to jillianpodcast@gmail.com
